a.n: Sur La Piste Des Senteurs - Japon

p.d: The ten virtues of the koh Scents and fragrances are frequently encountered in Japanese traditions, including chadô (the tea ceremony), kadô (the "way of flowers") and above all kôdô (the "way of incense"). In Tokyo, Stéphane Piquart meets the perfumer Satori Osawa. Together, they visit Nara province and mount Koya to learn the secrets of incense. Directed by: Daniel Serre (France, 2018)
